# SingleStoreConnection.ClearAllPoolsAsync method

Asynchronously clears all connection pools.

```csharp
public static Task ClearAllPoolsAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| cancellationToken | A token to cancel the asynchronous operation. |

## Return Value

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.
